alert.note: Alert for Harding; Perkins (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 8:47PM MST until February 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIDESPREAD SNOW AND DANGEROUSLY COLD TEMPERATURES... .Snow will continue across the area this evening before tapering off from west to east overnight. The combination of snow and breezy winds will lead to difficult travel conditions across northeastern Wyoming and much of South Dakota through tonight. The bitterly cold air will produce wind chills as low as 25 below to 40 below zero across the area through late week. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Harding County and Perkins County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. This will create dangerous conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
